author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Healthy diet: 4 natural ways to boost your brain health
text:
New Delhi: Brain is among the most essential organ of the body. Research has shown that improved brain health is linked with better physical, mental and emotional well-being. However, in the present era, various lifestyle habits are affecting the organ. These habits include, smoking, binge drinking, unhealthy eating, lack of physical activity are damaging the brain.
Moreover, the environmental conditions are not helping at all. Air pollution, climate change, heatwave, cold wave, and several other are also impacting the brain health. But the good news is that brain health can be improved with good food.
4 foods to eat for brain health
Leafy greens: Foods like kale, spinach, collards, and broccoli are rich in brain-healthy nutrients. Research found that these foods can help slow cognitive decline.
Fatty fish: Filled with omega-3 fatty acid, fatty fish are brain boosting foods. These are abundant sources of healthy unsaturated fats that have been linked to lower blood levels of beta-amyloid-the protein that forms damaging clumps in the brains of people with Alzheimer’s disease.
It has been advised to eat fish at least twice a week, but before starting this diet you must consult your physician. If you’re not a fan of fish, ask your doctor about taking an omega-3 supplement, or choose terrestrial omega-3 sources such as flaxseeds, avocados, and walnuts.
Berries: Research shows flavonoids, the natural plant pigments that give berries their brilliant hues, also help improve memory. Aa per a study, conducted by Harvard’s Brigham and Women’s Hospital researchers, found that women who consumed two or more servings of strawberries and blueberries each week delayed memory decline by up to two-and-a-half years.
Walnuts: Nuts are excellent sources of protein and healthy fats, and one type of nut in particular might also improve memory. Especially walnuts, they do not just look like human brain but act as brain booster as well. Moreover, the nutrients in this nut have been linked to lower blood pressure and cleaner arteries. That’s good for both the heart and brain.

author: 文匯報
title: 見證仿生手鐵畫銀鈎 感受AI便利實用 - 香港 - 香港文匯網
text:
為了進一步了解創科為生活帶來的益處，李家超和團隊還參訪了「杭州六小龍」之一、主力研發腦機接口的強腦科技。在那裏，強腦科技的體驗官倪敏成用殘臂熟練地戴上了BrainCo智能仿生手，一氣呵成地向李家超展示了用意識控制智能仿生手操縱毛筆寫字的功力。據了解，這也是全球首款能直覺控制單指運動的神經控制假肢。
●李家超（中）參訪浙江強腦科技有限公司，見證智能仿生手操縱毛筆寫字的功力。 除了到訪杭州未來科技城展館，李家超和團隊還來到了浙江大學醫學院附屬第一醫院總部，了解智慧醫院運作和應用醫療科技最新發展，包括在研發全新治療惡性血液病方案的成果，以及利用人工智能技術作精準臨床診斷。「不停穿梭的自動化藥物配送系統和先進機械人手術系統，讓我親身感受到AI的便利性和實用性。」李家超說。
為了進一步了解創科為生活帶來的益處，李家超和團隊還參訪了「杭州六小龍」之一、主力研發腦機接口的強腦科技。在那裏，強腦科技的體驗官倪敏成用殘臂熟練地戴上了BrainCo智能仿生手，一氣呵成地向李家超展示了用意識控制智能仿生手操縱毛筆寫字的功力。據了解，這也是全球首款能直覺控制單指運動的神經控制假肢。
「BrainCo智能仿生手，是一款融合腦機接口技術與人工智能算法的高科技康復輔具，通過採集、處理人體運動產生的肌電、神經電信號來實現仿生手的動作控制。」倪敏成介紹道，通過不斷的調試，目前這款智能仿生手可以滿足自己日常生活使用所需要的常用手勢，實現「大腦想做什麼動作，仿生手就執行什麼動作」。
「強腦科技創始人兼首席執行官韓璧丞早前來港出席世界互聯網大會亞太峰會時，我已被他的致辭打動，」李家超在社交平台上寫道，我很高興今天在杭州再次見到韓璧丞，並得知他認同香港有得天獨厚的「內聯外通」以及教育科研優勢，有意和香港加強交流和合作。「特區政府會為他們提供協助，希望在為他們拓展國際市場的同時，他們亦可推動香港創科發展，促成雙方更多合作，取得雙贏。」
讀文匯報PDF版面

author: @andaluciainf
title: Estabilizado el incendio forestal en el paraje de Canillas, en Algeciras  | Andalucía Información. Noticias del Campo de Gibraltar
text: Efectivos del dispositivo de la Junta de Andalucía para la prevención y extinción de incendios (Plan Infoca) trabajan desde última hora de este jueves en un incendio forestal que se ha declarado en el paraje de Canillas, en Algeciras (Cádiz). Hacia las 23.00 horas, el Infoca ha dado el fuego por estabilzado, según avanzaba en sus redes sociales el alcalde de Algeciras, José Ignacio Landaluce. Según han informado a EFE fuentes del Infoca, el incendio se ha declarado en torno a las 19.45 horas en el mismo paraje en el que a finales del mes de agosto se calcinaron tres hectáreas de matorral en el Parque Natural del Estrecho. Los efectivos del Plan Infoca trabajan en estos momentos en la zona, donde han desplegado tres grupos de bomberos forestales, un técnico de operaciones, un agente de medio ambiente y dos vehículos autobomba. Landaluce añadía poco antes de la medianoche en las redes sociales que "siguen trabajando para controlarlo con 2 grupos de bomberos forestales, 2 autobombas y un agente de medio ambiente. Además, Bomberos y Policía Local se mantienen prevenidos para prestar apoyo". Envía tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)
